scenarios.title: Unclear Expectations
scenarios.description: Practice addressing unclear project requirements with your manager
scenarios.context: Your manager assigned you a project last week, but the requirements keep changing and you're unsure about priorities.

culturalAdaptations.east-asia: Use indirect language, possibly through a mediator
culturalAdaptations.latin-america: Build personal rapport first, show understanding

scenarios.initialPrompt: Hi, I wanted to discuss the project you assigned last week. I'm finding it challenging to make progress.

aiPersona.name: Alex Chen
aiPersona.personality: Busy, sometimes distracted, well-intentioned but not always clear

scenarios.title: Missed Handoff
scenarios.description: Address a missed deadline with a peer colleague
scenarios.context: Your colleague was supposed to deliver their part of the project yesterday, but it's still not complete.

culturalAdaptations.east-asia: Focus on group impact, save face

scenarios.initialPrompt: Hey, I noticed the design mockups weren't ready yesterday. Can we talk about the timeline?

scenarios.title: Reversing a Decision
scenarios.description: Discuss concerns about a recent team decision that needs reconsideration
scenarios.context: The team decided to use a new technology stack, but after initial implementation, you've discovered serious issues.
scenarios.initialPrompt: I've been working with the new stack we chose, and I have some significant concerns we need to discuss.

aiPersona.name: Sam Patel
aiPersona.personality: Confident, invested in the decision, open to data

scenarios.title: Addressing Cultural Misalignment
scenarios.description: Discuss behavior that conflicts with team values
scenarios.context: A team member has been taking sole credit for collaborative work, which goes against your team's values.
scenarios.initialPrompt: I wanted to talk about something I observed in yesterday's presentation to leadership.

aiPersona.name: Riley Johnson
aiPersona.personality: Ambitious, defensive initially, capable of reflection

scenarios.title: Setting Workload Boundaries
scenarios.description: Communicate about unsustainable workload with your manager
scenarios.context: You've been working 60+ hours for the past month and it's affecting your wellbeing and work quality.
scenarios.initialPrompt: I'd like to discuss my current workload and how we can make it more sustainable going forward.

aiPersona.name: Morgan Davis
aiPersona.personality: Results-focused, unaware of the issue, reasonable when informed

scenarios.title: Resolving Peer Disagreement
scenarios.description: Navigate a disagreement about project approach with a peer
scenarios.context: You and a colleague have opposing views on the technical approach for a critical project feature.
scenarios.initialPrompt: I know we have different views on the authentication approach. Can we work through this together?

aiPersona.name: Casey Williams
aiPersona.personality: Technically strong, passionate about their approach, collaborative when engaged properly
